content:
This PR #18463 defines the type of sequences of length 0, 1, or ω, i.e. Option α ⊕ (ℕ → α). The plan is to use these to encode fundamental sequences in ordinal notations, generalizing docs#ONote.fundamentalSequence.

Currently I'm only defining a basic API with a lot of one-line results, so this PR should hopefully be simple to review.
